name: .WBOX File Extension
summary: Learn about .WBOX files and view a list of programs that open them.

instructions: WBOX files are not meant to be opened manually by players. To use a WBOX file with WorldBox, place the file in one of your game save folders (e.g. ~/​mkarpenko/​WorldBox/​saves/​save1). Then, load that saved game in WorldBox.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
